description:
After Honoka collapses, μ`s cancels its school festival concert. A few days later as she is recovering, Honoka learns from Eli that μ`s has revoked its entry into the Love Live. Honoka returns to school, but with her goal of working toward the Love Live lost, she is out of sorts. Meanwhile, due to the girls` actions the number of prospective students for Otonokizaka High skyrockets, and the school decides to admit new students next year. The Idol Study Club hosts a party to celebrate the continued existence of the school, but during the party, Umi makes a shocking revelation...!
Source: crunchyroll
